taskDescription: Copy the Account details of the user to AD
Copy the code to powershell. Please make sure that licenses are already assigned before running the script. And you should manually add the distribution list email on Add-DistributionGroupMember
Send the request to Teams Group 'Zendesk Account Creation'

Duplicate your ticket, edit and add "-Local IT Set up" on the Subject. Copy the Email, ADID, and password to your dashlane > Secure Notes > and share it to the local IT. Paste note on the Local IT ticket that credentials has been shared via dashlane
Send the request to the Teams GC
Ask HRBP if PPF Form has been submitted to People Operations mailbox. Include People Operations email on the CC
Duplicate your ticket, edit and add '- Coruson Account Creation' on the subject and assign the ticket and send the account details to Jaya

Duplicate your ticket, edit and add '- K2 Account Creation' on the subject and assign the ticket to group Automation Intelligent Team. Send the account details to k2_itdigital@swiredigital.com. Note that you need to manually add the copy user
